thread.title: 4 Nights in Hong Kong and Macau, Hotels and Tours Included, for Just $999
thread.title_full: 4 Nights in Hong Kong and Macau, Hotels and Tours Included, for Just $999

title: 4 Nights in Hong Kong and Macau, Hotels and Tours Included, for Just $999
text: Send Hong Kong at night. (Photo: Thinkstock) The deal : A five-day, four-night vacation to Hong Kong and Macau , including hotels, transfers, and tours, for $999 per person. When you’ll go : Any time from Dec. 1-Dec. 17, Jan. 24-Feb. 6, or Feb. 14-March 3. Why we love it : This is a superb price for a four-night stay in two of beautiful Asian cities. Both hotels – Regal Kowloon and Grand Emperor – get four stars on TripAdvisor, and the included tours will show you many of the cities’ highlights. Breakfasts are included as well. What you can do there: In Hong Kong, you can cruise Hong Kong Harbor, shop at the Stanley Market and take a ride up Victoria Peak. In Macau, your tours include the Grand Prix circuit, the statue of Kum Iam, the A-Ma-Temple, and St. Paul’s ruins. How long does this deal last? Nov. 30 (subject to availability) This deal was provided by Travelzoo Reblog
